20101208060147.000|20101208060149.500|CCO|INTERVIEW WITH ELIZABETH
20101208060149.500|20101208060152.000|CCO|EDWARDS.
20101208060152.000|20101208060154.000|CCO|SHE MET JOHNNY EDWARDS IN LAW
20101208060154.000|20101208060156.000|CCO|SCHOOL AND MARRIED HIM IN 1977
20101208060156.000|20101208060158.000|CCO|SHE BECAME A SUCCESSFUL LAWYER
20101208060158.000|20101208060200.000|CCO|AND A DEDICATED MOTHER.
20101208060200.000|20101208060202.000|CCO|A LIFE TO BE ADMIRED UNTIL HER
20101208060202.000|20101208060204.500|CCO|OLDEST SON WAS KILLED IN A CAR

20101208060207.000|20101208060209.500|CCO|IT WAS DURING HER GRIEF SHE
20101208060209.500|20101208060212.000|CCO|CHANGED HER NAME TO EDWARDS,

20101208060808.000|20101208060810.000|CCO|DOWN THAT ROAD, WE THINK.
20101208060810.000|20101208060812.000|CCO|>> FRANK VALUES THE TEAM AT 800
20101208060812.000|20101208060813.667|CCO|MILLION ACCORDING TO SOME
